document.full_text: missing chunks of dna responsible for turning genes on and off help explain some key differences between chimpanzees and humans -- including why humans have big brains and why the human penis is not covered with prickly spines, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
document.title: how humans got big brains, barbless penises
lines_and_colors: missing chunks of dna responsible for turning genes on and off help explain some key differences between chimpanzees and humans -- including why humans have big brains and why the human penis is not covered with prickly spines, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
